Reworked version of the removed game mode, Dominion. 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Please don't bother bringing back Ascension unless you balance how you get points in-game. I've never seen so many salty players as I have in that game mode because of how unbalanced and long it is.
Literally, just pick rek'sai, get ascended, and ult to a burrow in base. It works but for some reason Shen ult doesn't.

SOMEONE HELP WHEN I TRY TO INVITE SOMEONE IT SAYS THEY DONT MEET REQUIREMENTS. HEEEEEEEELP

This means that the person is either: - too under-leveled to join the type of queue you're trying to invite them to - online through a phone application and thus can't join your party because he/she isn't really online - or you/or the person is undergoing client bugs and errors.
Will Riot bring back nemesis draft because I want to play that gamemode!

Riot, you really screwed over kindred in this one for all mode. Kindred no longer has a passive. Please ban kindred like you did teemo.

One for All has brought out some of the most toxic people I've seen. I'm getting flamed for everything. I die once, flamed, I'm bad with a champ I don't own, flamed, I try not to fall for bit, flamed for them falling for it. -.- Like c'mon people, we are better than this, stop being pieces of shit and just enjoy a damn game of nonsense.
